ChatBot Oriented Design¶

Basic Constructs¶

cereal.chatbot provides a chat bot for Cereal.

class cereal.chatbot.ChatBotBase(url=None, bot_token='Talk to https://telegram.me/botfather to get one!')[source]¶

Base Class for chat bot used as service agent.

It can be used to create a chatbot for refering vsys info, using Telegram chatbot as base.

bot_token¶

Telegram chatbot token.

url¶

VSYS full node url with which to get info.

ChatBot Manipulations¶

cereal.chatbot.chatbot provides a chat bot for Cereal.

class cereal.chatbot.chatbot.ChatBot(url, bot_token)[source]¶

Class for ChatBot.

It can be used to create a chatbot for refering vsys info, using Telegram chatbot as base.

bot¶

Telegram chatbot.

url¶

VSYS full node url with which to get info.

echo(bot)[source]¶

Echo the message the user sent.

run()[source]¶

Run the bot.

Cereal
